claim: The Estimated Average Requirement (EAR) of protein for Indian adults is 0.66 g/kg body weight/day, and the Recommended Dietary Allowance (RDA) is 0.83 g/kg body weight/day.
limitations: Based on high-quality nitrogen balance studies on Indian subjects.

claim: Visible fat intake should be restricted to 20-25g/day for sedentary adults to prevent chronic disease.
limitations: Assumes adequate invisible fat intake from cereals/pulses.
